New Records: Adolis Garcia recorded three runs and five RBIs, stretching the Rangers' lead and earning him the MVP of the ALCS
Key Match Events: Corey Seager hit a rocket to right center field to silence the sellout crowd and get the Rangers on the board
The Rangers were lights out in the 4th inning adding four runs to their lead
Adolis Garcia hit a grand slam during the ninth inning of Game 6
Pre-Game Insights: Texas Rangers Manager Bruce Bochy explained how Corey Seager's first inning home run fired up the whole club
Post-Match Reflections: Houston Manager Dusty Baker talked about how proud he is of his team and how far they've come
Bruce Bochy said the Rangers are lucky to have Garcia
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Texas Rangers advance to the World Series to face the winner of the NLCS
Game 7 of the NLCS between the Arizona Diamondbacks and Philadelphia Phillies is on Tuesday
